alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Fayette Ridges; Greene (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 3:11PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT EAST CENTRAL GREENE AND SOUTHERN FAYETTE COUNTIES THROUGH 345 PM EDT... At 311 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles east of South Connellsville to near Jefferson Boro. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Uniontown, Masontown, Farmington, Fairdale, Fairchance, Smithfield, Nemacolin, Greensboro, Chalkhill, Ohiopyle, Mill Run, and Normalville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
